response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your endeavors. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
